title: classic script font
tags: Any ideas on this script? Thanks in advance
content:
Hello again, this time I need help identifying a script font. For info, the first letter of that word is a capital G. Thanks !

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141026194721im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gelinaufont2_4328.jpg)
author: Zalhietzli

comments.content:
ITC Edwardian Script. The ball in the center of the bottom loop is used in an alt G.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/edwardian-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141026194721/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/edwardian-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/edwardian-script/")  
Don
